scene_description_enriched: A male figure, depicted frontally with a golden halo, stands holding a large, blue-covered book in his left arm and a golden object, possibly a chalice or reliquary, in his right hand. He wears a red robe adorned with vertical gold stripes and a white collar. The background is a light blue sky with a green landscape below. The figure's attire and the halo suggest he is a saint or a religious figure.
scene_interpretation: Saint holding a book and a chalice
